# Goal Achievement App

Achieve your goals with deep planning, reflection and data-driven insights.

__   Web App

## Deep Planning

Common plans are sequential. You break your goals down into steps and order
them into a timeline. The trouble is: No plan survives contact with reality.
Things won't go as expected, conditions change, life happens. Then you have to
update your plan - the whole sequence. A hassle at best, motivation killer at
worst.

With deep planning, you don't create sequential plans. Instead, you create a
hierarchy. **Think about what you want to achieve for your goal this year**.
Based on that, what do you want to achieve this month? This week? Today?

This way you can easily plan your life strategically and adjust your plans
with little effort.

## Self-Reflection

Life is learning. To achieve your goals you have to constantly adjust and
improve your approach. Self-reflection is the tool to just that.

At the end of each planning period, your **goal achievement app** Focality
will ask you to look back. What went well? What not? How can you improve?
Think about your achievements and your potential.

By making this an integral part of the process, self-improvement will become
second nature to you.

## A Goal Achievement App for iOS, Android and the Web

Use Focality on any device. With native apps for iOS and Android as well as a
smooth browser version, Focality is a **goal achievement app** that you can
use anytime, anywhere. Reflect on your day using your phone on the couch.
Check in on your goals during work on your browser. All data is synced between
devices.

Achieve

Set your goals and pursue them with consistency. Whether personal or
professional, our **goal achievement app** will get you there.

Focus

Keep focused on your achievements. Always know what to focus on right now.

Unleash your potential

Use self-reflection and data-driven insights to unleash your potential.

  1.   2.   3.   4.   5.   6. 

Be proactive

Act, don't react. Take control of your life and form it proactively.

Be relaxed

Stop feeling overwhelmed. Use your solid plans to know where you are, where
you are going and stop worrying.

Try now

Features

__

Planning

Plan what you want to achieve - this year, this month and this week.

__

Reflection

Frequently take a step back. What went well? What did not? How can I do better
next time?

__

Insight

Improve yourself through your own reflections and data driven analysis.

Get started

Download the app or use it directly in your browser.

__   Web App

## More about achieving goals

A **goal achievement app** will help you to achieve your goals with ease. Want
to know more about the process of setting goals in the first place? Read on.

Our extensive guide to personal goal setting will help you understand the
topic in depth. Learn why it is important to set goals, what types of goals
you should consider, attributes of well-defined goals, which ones to choose
and pointers to even deeper dives.

» Personal Goal Setting: Why, How to and (much, much) more

For the actual goal setting and achievement process, it often helps to have
some guiding questions. That's why we have compiled an extensive list of such
questions including explanations on their background. Use these to discover
goal ideas, prioritize them and flesh out the most promising goals.

» Goal Setting Questions: Discover, Prioritize and Define Goal Ideas

Finally, if you are looking for motivation it is always great to let yourself
be inspired by motivational quotes from famous (and not-so-famous) thinkers.
Our collection of goal setting quotes will offer you a rich source of
inspiration:

» Motivational Quotes for Goal Setting
